data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 20,408 believers in the state of Khabarovsk to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khabarovsk, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Khabarovsk, Russia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Khabarovsk.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Khabarovsk, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Nanai, Hezhen people. Make the Nanai, Hezhen people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Khabarovsk, Russia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Khabarovsk, Russia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Khabarovsk, Russia has a population of 1,394,500.

We estimate Khabarovsk has 20,408 people who might know Jesus, 782,708 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 591,384 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who are far from you in Khabarovsk. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
